entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
